    available_options() click to toggle source 
    # File fastlane/lib/fastlane/actions/clipboard.rb, line 18
def self.available_options
  [
    FastlaneCore::ConfigItem.new(key: :value,
                                 env_name: "FL_CLIPBOARD_VALUE",
                                 description: "The string that should be copied into the clipboard")
  ]
end

    @!group Documentation

    # File fastlane/lib/fastlane/actions/clipboard.rb, line 14
def self.description
  "Copies a given string into the clipboard. Works only on macOS"
end
    example_code() click to toggle source 
    # File fastlane/lib/fastlane/actions/clipboard.rb, line 34
def self.example_code
  [
    'clipboard(value: "https://docs.fastlane.tools/")',
    'clipboard(value: lane_context[SharedValues::HOCKEY_DOWNLOAD_LINK] || "")'
  ]
end

    run(params) click to toggle source 
    # File fastlane/lib/fastlane/actions/clipboard.rb, line 4
def self.run(params)
  UI.message("Storing '#{params[:value]}' in the clipboard ðŸŽ¨")

  %x`echo "#{params[:value]}" | tr -d '\n' | pbcopy` # we don't use `sh`, as the command looks ugly
end
